455: 	var startCoords, endCoords map[string]int
456: 	json.Unmarshal([]byte(start.Coordinates), &startCoords)
457: 	json.Unmarshal([]byte(end.Coordinates), &endCoords)

259: 		var value float64
260: 		fmt.Sscanf(cr, "%f", &value)
261: 		return value

251: 					var newConditions []string
252: 					json.Unmarshal(action.ConditionsApplied, &newConditions)
253: 					conditions = append(conditions, newConditions...)

256: 	// D&D ability
257: 	v.RegisterValidation("dnd_ability", func(fl validator.FieldLevel) bool {
258: 		validAbilities := map[string]bool{
259: 			"strength":     true,
260: 			"str":          true,
261: 			"dexterity":    true,
262: 			"dex":          true,
263: 			"constitution": true,
264: 			"con":          true,
265: 			"intelligence": true,
266: 			"int":          true,
267: 			"wisdom":       true,
268: 			"wis":          true,
269: 			"charisma":     true,
270: 			"cha":          true,
271: 		}
272: 
273: 		if value, ok := fl.Field().Interface().(string); ok {
274: 			return validAbilities[strings.ToLower(value)]
275: 		}
276: 		return false
277: 	})
278: }
